EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Re: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners 1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Stan,
I apologize for not getting back to you on Friday, I was out of the office. I would like to schedule a time to speak with you, so I have attached a link to my calendar below for you to select a time that is convenient for you.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
I am working from home today (I am a little under the weather) but should be back in the office tomorrow. I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Thank you, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Hayward Florer [mailto:florerhs@cox.net] Sent: Friday, October 21, 2011 4:42 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners
Nicolette,
Forgive my slow response. I’ve been out of the office. Can you call today? I would like to explore joining MBO Partners.
Warmest Regards, Stan
On 10/20/11 6:32 PM, "Nicolette Taylor" <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Dear Stan,
Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is Nicolette Taylor, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day.
If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK.
I look forward to speaking with you!
Best regards,
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager MBO Partners
